name: GOING NUTS (itch) (OUTCASTgames)
description:
Walter the Squirrel has got himself into another Nutty situation. Can you save him?

DIRECTIONS:

A or Left arrow = Left

D or Right arrow = Right

Don't get thumped by the falling acorns!

Please follow me on itch so I don't have to live in my Mom's basement forever...

CREDIT:

Special thanks to these amazing creators for their sound effects!

ohforheavensake and citrus-audio
